body:
SELECT DATEADD( DAY, DATEDIFF( DAY, 0, GETDATE()), 0 ) AS today ,
	   CAST(FLOOR(CONVERT(decimal(12 , 3) , GETDATE() , 103)) AS smalldatetime)	AS today , 
	   DATEADD ( mi  , -1, DATEADD( DAY, DATEDIFF( DAY, 0, GETDATE()), 1 )) AS endOfToday ,
	   DATEADD( DAY, DATEDIFF( DAY, 0, GETDATE()), -1 ) AS yesterday ,
	   DATEADD( DAY, DATEDIFF( DAY, 0, GETDATE()), 1 ) AS tomorrow ,
	   DATEADD ( DAY , 1 - DATEPART ( WEEKDAY, GETDATE() ), DATEADD( DAY, DATEDIFF( DAY, 0, GETDATE()), 0 ) ) AS firstDayOfCurrentWeek ,
	   DATEADD ( mi  , -1, DATEADD ( DAY , 8 - DATEPART ( WEEKDAY, GETDATE() ), DATEADD( DAY, DATEDIFF( DAY, 0, GETDATE()), 0 ) ) ) AS endDayOfCurrentWeek,
       DATEADD( MONTH, DATEDIFF( MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), 0 ) AS firstDayOfCurrentMonth ,     
	   DATEADD ( mi, -1, DATEADD ( mm, DATEDIFF ( mm, 0, GETDATE ()) + 1, 0 )) AS endOfCurrentMonth , 
	   DATEADD ( MONTH, DATEDIFF ( MONTH, 0, GETDATE ()) -1, 0 ) AS firstDayOfPrevMonth ,
	   DATEADD ( mi, -1, DATEADD ( MONTH, DATEDIFF ( MONTH, 0, GETDATE ()) -1, 31 )) AS endOfPrevMonth ,
       DATEADD( MONTH, DATEDIFF( MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), -1 ) AS lastDayOfLastMonth ,
       DATEADD( MONTH, DATEDIFF( MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), 31 ) AS firstDayOfNextMonth,
	   DATEADD ( QUARTER, DATEDIFF ( QUARTER, 0, GETDATE ()), 0 ) AS firstDayOfCurrentQuarter ,
	   DATEADD ( mi, -1, DATEADD ( QUARTER, DATEDIFF ( QUARTER, 0, GETDATE ()) + 1, 0 )) AS endDayOfCurrentQuarter ,
	   DATEADD ( YEAR, -1, DATEADD ( YEAR, DATEDIFF ( YEAR, 0, GETDATE ()), 0 )) firstDayOfPrevYear,
	   DATEADD ( mi, -1, DATEADD ( YEAR, DATEDIFF ( YEAR, 0, GETDATE ()), 0 ))lastDayOfPrevYear , 
	   DATEADD(wk, DATEDIFF(wk, 0, getdate()) - 1, -1) as LastWeekStart ,
	   DATEADD(wk, datediff(wk, 0, getdate()), -1) as ThisWeekStart ,
	   DATEADD(wk, datediff(wk, 0, getdate()) + 1, -1) as NextWeekStart
